name: G3 Minimist Speed
description: Grippy and ultrlight, these mohair skins offer reliable backcountry performance with unrivaled weight and packability. Small enough to pack in your pocket, the G3 Minimist Speed skins feature a carbon fibre insert at the tip to prevent snow creep, while a low profile tail connector keeps it fast and easy to adjust or remove.100% mohair for maximum grip and packability.RipStrip makes pulling apart skins easier, and can be removed for added traction in case of adhesion contamination.16cm length adjustment fits a wide range of ski sizes.Hydrophobic water treatment prevents snow or ice clumping.Non-toxic adhesive is functional to -30C.Trim tool included.
